Checkers
Class Coord

java.lang.Object
  Checkers.Coord

public class Coord
extends java.lang.Object

This contains an index into the board and an additional field to store a jumpCount (to mark ordering in a sequence of pieces).

          An additional field able to be used to mark ordering in a sequence of pieces
